author: Suburban Trends
title: West Milford mayor deserves to be re-elected - Politics
text:
Mayor deserves to be re-elected 
Dear Editor:
During our 35 years as residents of Newfoundland, I can think of no other public official who has devoted as much time and energy to improving so many diverse aspects of West Milford as has Bettina Bieri. You will note that I purposely did not say, "Mayor." While that is her highest and most important office, it is not the only one at which she has worked tirelessly. 
She has given freely of her time to do commendable work with the animal shelter as well, a constituency of dogs, cats and other animals which cannot even vote for her.
No matter what one's political persuasions may be, we can all recognize Bettina Bieri's efforts to make our community a better place to live and we should be grateful for her accomplishments. She deserves to be reelected as our mayor.
James W. Keenan, 
Newfoundland
